title: Did Dire Wolves bootcamp for worlds like all the major teams?
body: Or did they just stay here?

replies.body:
I'm disappointed, as usual, by the way DW bow out, especially their showing in the last game. OCE just continue to look like the clown region of worlds.

I really don't want to slam anyone as I'm sure they were all really hungry to do well. But there are so many inexcusable mistakes in all their games. Are we really that trash of a region?

For example Phantiks (sorry just one slam) wandering out of position for cs greed three bloody times. That is just so so tragic. No communication? No map aware? No clue?

Each year there's such a brief opportunity for OCE and each year it's felt completely squandered by such simple mistakes and undisciplined plays. Pity.
You can watch some of Phantiks replays from Korea here: http://www.op.gg/summoner/userName=123ok
Yeah they've been over training in Korea - scrims and solo q and are now in China ready to do us proud!
